life_date: Claes Oldenburg, American (born Sweden), 1929–2022; Experiments in Art and Technology, Inc. (E.A.T.), New York, Publisher; Styria Studio, New York, Printer
markings: Rubber stamp on label on verso, LL: [COPYRIGHT 1973 BY CLAES OLDENBURG / PRINTED AT STYRIA STUDIO]
medium: Screenprint and lithograph, hand-dusted with ground chalk
portfolio: The New York Collection for Stockholm
provenance: Steven M. Andersen, Minneapolis (former assistant printer at Styria Studio, Ltd., New York); sold to MIA, 1979.
title: M. Mouse (with) 1 Ear (equals) Tea Bag Blackboard Version (1965)
